thread.title: Andrew Campbell
thread.title_full: SHOWER SEAL LTD reviewed by Andrew Campbell

author: Andrew Campbell
title: Andrew Campbell
text: I ordered some top rollers for a shower door where the originals had broken and there was no indication of make to buy replacements. (Bought at Stax wholesalers). I used the measurement guide online and it worked a treat. Rollers fitted, door repaired for Â£12. My friend had been thinking about ripping out the entire shower enclosure and replacing it, so she was well chuffed. Thank you ShowerSeal.
